website_summaries.verdict: This dispenser has a unique contemporary look that helps to extend the shelf life of your oil.
pros: Unique and modern design that comes in a range of colors
Opaque container protects oil from the effects of sunlight
Ergonomic grip that is easy to clean
cons: Difficult to tell how much oil is in it, or how much you are preparing to pour out

customer_reviews.title: Leaks without being used
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product would be amazing due to siZe, shape and color....... it leaks everywhere without me even using it. I don’t see any cracks and it’s not overfilled..... super disappointing This is a pic of it just sitting for 3 days on my counter. See how much is leaking!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As practical as beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This thing is extremely awesome. I never would have bought it if it wasn't on clearance, but I'm glad I did. I'm not a foodie and usually I pour the olive oil straight from the bottle, but I had a drippy bottle and bought this to fill with a funnel. It is excellent because you can control the flow and do not use too much oil by accident. It is a bit difficult to fill with a regular funnel because of the angle of the bottle neck, and it is a little on the small side for my taste, but it has an excellent handle grip and it is really a work of art. Yes, buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Clothes Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Feel like I'm Rachael Ray, Martha Stewart
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser makes cooking so easy. It's easy to grip and pours a decent size amount of oil at one time. I have not had any leaking issues at all. It does get grimy after a while, but some warm water and Dawn dishwashing liquid will get it nice and clean again. You will need to polish it with a dry towel to get the shine back. Overall great purchase. Glad I tried it out. I first saw this on FlavCity's YouTube channel and I knew I had to have it for my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: HBM

customer_reviews.title: extremely poor design, hard to clean.  Filthy upon arrival. Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: This is not very safe as oil will unintentionally leak/drip out of container as a result of the poor design. Also it comes delivered absolutely filthy which in itself isn't an issue, but as the awkward new age shape it is nearly impossible to properly clean without special tools 10/10 Looks really nice! 1/10 Application use 10/10 Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: Why don't you just make it straight? The curve shape delay the fluid coming out, and once out it keeps dripping won't stop. It is simply dumb to make such a shape for no good reason.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully impractical
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser might have some value from an aesthetic sense or possibly a conversation piece, but it is not practical. To be clear, I do not have any complaints with the quality yet (two weeks), just the design. If you are looking for a better way to control the pour, this is not the right product because you can't see the oil. When it does come out its too fast, just like from most bottles. I wish I had thought this through before purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cloudy

customer_reviews.title: Great to use
customer_reviews.text: It's great to use and easy to clean. What a pain to fill up. Even with a funnel it was hard not to spill down the side and you have no way of knowing how full it is. I filled it with water, poured that into a measuring cup, dumped the water and filled the measuring cup to the same level as the water with the oil I wanted in the container. I'm just going to buy a cheap bottle with the right kind of spout next time.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Perfect olive oil dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Rachael Ray has a great design, and highly rated when compared with other olive oil dispensers. Lots of colors to choose from and I just love it. I want to be able to grab the oil and quickly add it where needed. The little cover flap will open and close automatically— that makes it so easy to grab and use. No more grabbing the bottle from the cupboard, unscrewing the lid, pouring and then rescrewing the top back on and wiping off the top. This is so easy. . . . perfect for the kitchen, or table.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Mapes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well-made!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this beautiful oil bottle!! It is very well made and is a nice weight, making it easy to use! I ordered the blue but was skeptical about the specific shade of blue, because I wanted it to coordinate with my Blue Willow china pieces in my kitchen. I was even more nervous before I opened the box because the color of the bottle on the box is more purplish blue, but was happy once I opened it because it matches my china perfectly!! I would describe it as almost a cobalt blue, similar to the Fiesta Cobalt Blue dinnerware.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Reece

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality poor thinking = little money
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it they need to tested more the product is couple of unbalance issues and for the people make this product don't think about the profit or how much money they are going to make is about the customer satisfaction you do good to your customers today and you will get the customers of the future like the kids they are the customers of the future the parents tell the kids and every body the product is great so when they grow up they will buy your product, I make a point. ???????????
customer_reviews.author: Ruben lopez

customer_reviews.title: Poor gasket, leaks
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful. Leaks no matter how I insert the gasket, rendering it useless. Poor design and quality. Skip this, you will just be frustrated. Too bad. I have been eying this for years.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Taylor-Moore

customer_reviews.title: Meh, it works, but is not best design
customer_reviews.text: I got this when it was on sale one day, I needed a replacement for a leaky plastic bottle. After a few months of using this, I can't say it has the best design. The oil start to rush out and because of curve it does not exactly lend itself to only using a little. I have also started to notice the cover/lid thing at the end is now dripping oil after use. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mathis

customer_reviews.title: I love this carafe
customer_reviews.text: I had this same carafe previously. I knocked it off the counter and it shattered to bits and pieces when it hit the tile floor. I love that it drizzles the oil and it is dark colored so oil is protected from light. It is easy to clean and can be put in a dish washer. Shipping took forever on this item. It was not shipped for five days after I ordered it. That is the only complaint that I have about this seller.
customer_reviews.author: A. Chaffer

customer_reviews.title: Classy, Attractive Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser looks very nice and works well for olive oil. It's pretty lightweight for a ceramic, but seems sturdy enough (though I have no intentions of testing that too thoroughly). It pours easily enough and the design is simple enough to go with just about any style of kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: WhiteManBlackHips

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, but with problems
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser works OK. It is stylish and holds a good amount of oil, however it is not ideal. Due to it's design, it tends to over dispense oil and it is somewhat hard to control. It think it is mainly due to the size of the spout. I bought this to replace another dispenser I dropped and broke. My original dispenser had a much smaller diameter spout and dispensed perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Abney

customer_reviews.title: Works well to control the flow of oil better than the bottle
customer_reviews.text: Works well to control the flow of oil better than the bottle. Does leave tiny drips though, which is why I gave it a four. Still better than a bottle.
customer_reviews.author: William Becker

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and practical
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased four of these bottles in total. Two for me - one for my EVOO and one for my vegetable oil, and two for my daughter. I love them. They aren't hard to clean and mostly you should only have to clean out the spout and wipe down the outside. I do occasionally clean out the bottles though. Hot soapy water and a bottle brush that is flexible leads to quick clean up.
customer_reviews.author: BarbiMedik

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is ergonomic, practical, and beautiful. I really wish they were more readily available so that I could have more of a selection of colors in my kitchen cabinet to switch out when I want to chose another color to use. They are easy to fill if you pay attention to the fill line of oil as it rises so as to prevent any over flow.
customer_reviews.author: IamSamantha

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: The bottle is very nice aesthetically. It hold a fair amount of oil and sits well on a modern counter top. Functionally, my complaint is that the oil surprises you and then comes out a bit fast. My preference would be a slightly more constrained drizzle so that I can have better control over the amount of oil going into the pan, or on the food.
customer_reviews.author: Shepherd357

customer_reviews.title: Awkward to fill and easy to break
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because it looked nice. Broke it as I was about to pour oil into it for the first time. Hard to angle to fill, so it slipped and fell from a standing position on the kitchen counter and shattered. Too bad I never got the chance to use it for its intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Y

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: It's a very fancy dispenser that enhances the beauty of your kitchen. The product was exactly as demonstrated in the description and the color looks so pretty in the kitchen counter. Howe, it very difficult to clean I put the dispenser in the dish washer but the water didn't drained well I kept it little tilted but the water didn't drained well. So it's difficult to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Anshika Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is my second RR oil dispenser and still happy with it. First one i dropped only reason had to get a new one. Little tab on end that opens with the force of oil pouring drops down after each use with no problems and the plastic insert that has to be take out to fill has not stretched out over time, I have had soap dispensers that have stretched out and no longer are useful,(not RR brand) glad these last. Very happy with price also!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Griz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works great too..easy to fill and does not leak.!!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Rovince

customer_reviews.title: Happy Olive Oil
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Looks so much nicer in the kitchen than my old plain jane one that I've had for almost 20 years! We recently updated our kitchen and now I am noticing things like this, the pepper grinder and so on are looking very dated. I really like the weight and capacity of this oil dispenser too. Having it on the back of the stove it is nice that the spout isn't straight up against the tile or collecting dust directly on the spout. Pretty green too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a orange colored container just switched to grey to match our remodeled kitchen. It is beautiful and I already knew that this oil container has no issues like leaking getting greasy or anything like that. Since I used the old one for 4 years. That one will now go to my mom in India :)
customer_reviews.author: BunnyRabbit

customer_reviews.text: I purchased ours a "returned item" i was like- hell yeah, saving some money. It has the most tiniest flaw in it. Ceramic items tend to do that. Duh! Still this design that Rachel Ray created it beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Cole

customer_reviews.title: Easy to dispense!
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease with which I can pour oil. There is a small spout for pouring, with a stopper for refilling. However, it only holds 24 ozs. and I refill it a lot. The style is well designed and easy to grip when pouring. Overall, it is convenient and nice looking in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Sissyll

customer_reviews.title: I finally found a good oil cruet
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a number of containers to hold my (cooking) oils at the stove. I've tried glass (makes the oils go rancid faster because of light), and pourers that don't open and close effectively. This one works great, the ceramic blocks light and heat. I've ordered 2 more (in different colors) for my other cooking oils.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D. Andres

customer_reviews.title: Best I've found so far
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one to replace the one my husband knocked of the kitchen counter and broke. I took off a star because it is not easy to clean the inside. Other than that, it's the best EVOO dispenser I've found so far.
customer_reviews.author: Little Shine

customer_reviews.title: Just dont tilt it so fast...
customer_reviews.text: I have not had any issues with leakage onto the counter as others have described. It doesn't run down the front or even drip. To pour I just tilt the item slowly forward until oil starts to come out so I have not had the experience of dumping too much as other reviewers have reported. It is difficult to see how much oil is in the container but oil containers need to restrict light exposure to keep the oil fresh. If you don't tilt too fast then not being able to see the oil coming isn't really an issue. I ordered orange and the color is vibrant and looks gorgeous just sitting on the counter.So happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Design is something I’ll learn to live with. Maybe.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that kept light out but because of the curve I can’t see how much is in the bottle. I can’t see when to stop filling until it’s too full. I thought I would like the design for easy pouring but wish I would have bought a can or green/amber bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my MCT oil and I now have one for every oil in my kitchen. I am able to have a different color for each oil since there are several to chose from. The stopper works well, it is easy to hold and pour from. My only complaint is the inability to clean the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this oil dispenser for a long time now. I first ordered one in 2016. Since I was moving to another place in 2018, I donated it. Not a scratch or a crack appeared in the two years of daily, rigorous use. I have ordered one more as they are pretty handy. It’s a little difficult to clean as the head hole circumference is small. But otherwise a great product! Totally worth the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Soumya

customer_reviews.title: Not horrible...but Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I love she shape, style, & color of this....but the functionality not so much. You can’t tell how much is in the bottle so refilling it is difficult. It’s fairly heavy even when empty so you don’t know how much to pour in when filling it up. I have ran it over a couple times because you can’t see how much is in there & like I said, it’s hard to gauge by weight since it’s heavy already. Serves the purpose for the time being but am definitely keeping an eye out for a new olive oil bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Gina K Altum

customer_reviews.title: I Highly recommend .
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd evoo DR dispenser. Just changing colors. Just love it. I use a small funnel to fill it up.. Wish could tell how much is in there. But it's not rocket science. I also like the spout cover to keep out bugs. Love this Gray color too.
customer_reviews.author: J'town Momma

customer_reviews.title: Drips oil down it's sides
customer_reviews.text: I like the look, shape, and material of the bottle, but the dispensing spout is horrible. The spout has a little hinged "flapper" that I think is supposed to cover the opening when it is not dispensing oil, but all it really does is collect enough oil that it dribbles down the side after each use. I have to wipe the spout each time I use it and even then it now sits on a paper towel on a plate because of the oil that drips and runs down the side even after it has been wiped off. Great idea but I will buy something else to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to receiving Rachel’s olive oil dispenser and was so surprised to find no way at all to tell how much olive oil is actually in this container. I like everything about it except that which is pretty major! I will now have to order one from Bed, Bath and Beyond. They have one that is glass. Not as nice as Rachel’s but far more practical. Kind of a waste of $$. I’m surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: No mess dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Finally oil is not dripping everywhere. Easy to use and put oil in. The only thing that i didn't like is you cannot see how much oil you put in to the dispenser and you cannot clean it easily if you need to. But in general good thing to have.
customer_reviews.author: otherthing85

customer_reviews.title: Leaks -  Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: It leaks. The nozzle design doesn’t allow the spout to fit snugly. I also found it hard to fill.
customer_reviews.author: Bret

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Used constantly in my kitchen but showing no signs of wear. The stoneware feels nicely weighty and well made. Dispenses oil perfectly. Glad to have this out on the counter instead of the branded bottle of oil. The green one looks like a pear 🍐
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty EVOO dispenser
customer_reviews.text: This is my second dispenser of its type, not because anything broke, but because I wanted to use and have on hand other cooking oils. The dispenser sits pretty on the counter, but I must point out that the cap on the spout still falls (flaw in the design). Overall, it is still a very nice dispenser. I will continue to buy and I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Bright colors, solid construction, and beautiful piece. Holds a whole bottle of olive oil & looks so much nicer on my counter. Very comfortable handle and dispenses smoothly. Might get another in a different color!
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA COHEN

customer_reviews.title: A quality product and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is my second R.R. oil dispenser. I bought this one in a different color from my first to distinguish between varying oils I use frequently. It's easy to use and fill, and the plug hasn't had a problem with staying in place like I have had with other oil dispensers. I love the bright colors offered and that it is made to last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Handeyfan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful evoo dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful EVOO dispenser. I love Rachel Ray's colors for kitchen accessories. That said, I'm a little disappointed at how slow my EVOO takes to pour out, even if I tilt it drastically (and it's full), and I don't feel like I can control the flow of the oil as well as I did with my previous EVOO containers. Please let me know if you have an EVOO dispenser that you can recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Z

customer_reviews.title: Pours too fast and too much EVOO
customer_reviews.text: Love the price and the build quality but the problem with this item is the design. Since it curves forward, when you pour your oil out it pours way too fast. I have never been able to pour just a teaspoon or even tablespoon. I've decided to buy a pourer and use a dark wine bottle to store and dispense my EVOO. As with Amazon Prime, shipping and packing were great.
customer_reviews.author: The_doggie_days

customer_reviews.title: Color was exact...Bright Green!!!
customer_reviews.text: Unlike another reviewers comment I found the color {Green} to be exactly as portrayed as in the ad. It was a bright green ....not the olive color as the other reviewer mentioned...matches my decor perfectly!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P. Palermo

customer_reviews.title: Lime green
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design, colors, easy grip, and a great product!! I can just leave on my counter top now. The functional use close at hand is an essential time component for me. I always have my hands moving fast in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Leaks from spout stopper
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice looking bottle but the problem is that the oil leaks at the stopper (where the stopper contacts the bottle). Pressing the stopper into the bottle as far as it will go is not enough to create a solid seal to prevent leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Tom the Terp

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen look great and more organized
customer_reviews.text: It was a surprise for my wife as she kept refilling a small Avocado bottle with the larger bottle to reduce space on counter. This does that and looks awesome. Next will be to replace my generic clear glass olive oil bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Tom from Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Awkward to fill
customer_reviews.text: This looks nice, fits well in the hand but dispenses slow and is awkward to fill. I looked everywhere to try and find a replacement for my Italian ceramic oil dispenser & couldn't - I don't love it but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Pippen

customer_reviews.title: It’s all about what your priorities are
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it’s made in China but it works well and there aren’t a lot of choices that block harmful light. I was so weary of cleaning olive oil drips from the can. You could just buy a pouring top and use a colored glass bottle but I wanted complete darling for my exspensive olive oil and I got mine on sale.
customer_reviews.author: E. Tillema

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Find at an Amazing Price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! So easy to handle and holds a ton of cooking oil. I purchased the dark green. It goes beautifully with my kitchen decor. Just what I was looking for! Definitely worth the money. Thank you. A++
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L

customer_reviews.title: Beauty + Function!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous blue EVOO bottle for my kitchen! It is easy to use but you need to pay attention when pouring until you get the feel for how it comes out. I love it and I will probably get a green one for my avacado oil!
customer_reviews.author: Merry

customer_reviews.title: Cool gadget
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty cool. I like that it has a cover for the spout and its convenient instead of having to pull out my bottle of oil. There are others out there but they clog and they dont hold the same quantity.
customer_reviews.author: NW

customer_reviews.title: Don’t know if I like it or not!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well, when I got the package, the box was fine, but when I opened it, there was little packing to hold it in place & it was broken to pieces!!! I am not going to go thru the hassle of returning for a new one. Not worth it!!! But I think I would have liked it!! Teresa
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically Beautiful!, and functional
customer_reviews.text: I just received this, the pouring spout is missing a part, I basically can't close it. I will update review if the seller sends me a spout, otherwise I will have to return it. UPDATE: made replacement its now complete and beautiful. Leak proof!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dispenser so far. The color is very nice and I did receive the ombré version with the white bottom just like the product photo. Very functional and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Miss.JJ

customer_reviews.title: Like it but...
customer_reviews.text: each time I pour out some oil, no matter how big or small, there is always a drip that runs down the neck of the bottle. Other than that, I love the look, color is so pretty and it pours nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came Broken
customer_reviews.text: This product is stylish and practical for olive oil in the kitchen. However, when it first shipped I had ordered two. There was packaging on the top and bottom, but nothing in between the two. The top of one was in the handle of the other and they were completely shattered. If purchased, I would recommend not buying two at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend - Very cheap product
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Have received this twice by mail, once as a gift, the second time as a replacement. Both times the stoneware had hairline fractures that caused the product to leak. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: John R Vehmeyer Jr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect drizzle. Not sure how to clean though
customer_reviews.text: I used to spill large amounts of oil out of the original bottles. Now I get the perfect drizzle! I’m just not sure how to clean it because of the small opening and shape.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: I really like this oil dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I really like this oil dispenser. It prevents me from adding to much oil to the pan and looks great on the counter. Some people complained that it was hard to fill. I haven't has any trouble. It's slightly awkward because you can't see how full it is, but I can do it without a funnel and I just don't fill it to the very top.
customer_reviews.author: Stille20

customer_reviews.title: Perfect olive oil dispenser
customer_reviews.text: For whatever reason these olive oil dispensers can be difficult to find, unless you want a clear one. We were very happy when we found the Rachael Ray dispenser as it was both colorful and we figured it would be great quality with her name attached to it. And we were right. It holds a great deal of olive oil and we have had no issues the with pour spout either not pouring well or leaking through the sides. It also looks great sitting on the counter next to the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Crostic

customer_reviews.title: Handle with EXTREME care. Or don’t handle at all.
customer_reviews.text: I placed a funnel in it to fill it and the funnel moved a bit and it knocked over an shattered the top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser is exactly what the picture represents. I love it! I like it so much that I'm sort of happy my old one broke. I like this much better. The handle and the spout make it so convenient to use. It pours so easily. And it looks so nice sitting on my counter. Definitely a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: John Molstad

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish oil dispenser and easy to pour!
customer_reviews.text: This oil oil dispenser is exactly what I was looking for! I’m a little surprised it didn’t arrive broken, since the packaging wasn’t that secure around the dispenser...guess u was lucky. The flow of oil is great, it was easy to wash the first time and although you can’t see how much oil you have left, that’s not a dealbreaker for me. Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy G

customer_reviews.title: Great Dial, excellent product...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for one of those to keep my special cooking oil, since it can’t not be on the light. Oh man!! Rachael made my day... I love it so very much!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift and really like it. its good quality and pretty sturdy. it looks better than leaving the original olive oil bottle out
customer_reviews.author: HW9001

customer_reviews.title: Great Oil Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant styling that looks great on the counter. It can be a little awkward to fill, but really is no problem with a funnel.
customer_reviews.author: MachtGut

customer_reviews.title: Very cool EVOO bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil dispensing bottle. I have had many during my life and this is the best to date. It has a little cap on the top that opens when you pour oil. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to drizzle EVOO without dripping
customer_reviews.text: A good friend of mine told me about this EVOO dispensing bottle and I love it!! It has a little weight to it and is balanced nicely so I don't pour too much oil out, much easier to control the amount of oil I drizzle. It really looks nice sitting on my counter next to the stove and isn't an oily mess like some of the oil bottles can be. Haven't washed it out yet, so don't know how easy that will be... but it works and I like it!! It also protects the olive oil from too much light... Amazon even brought it to my door faster than they estimated!!
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Miller

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I ordered this. The color is gorgeous and unique. It’s ergonomic and so easy to handle. Two thumbs up and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not utilitarian
customer_reviews.text: Really cute but it’s impossible to tell how much oil you are pouring out. Plus each time you try to pour a little oil into the pan, a large quantity comes right out.
customer_reviews.author: Ambika

customer_reviews.title: Great oil dispenser
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent dispenser for olive oil and adds a nice pop of color to the kitchen. No problems with leaking and easy to fill.
customer_reviews.author: Linslie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is easy to hold and control the pour. Filling it is very straightforward as well. It is dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: Spout stays on
customer_reviews.text: I've had trouble with the oil jars and the spouts falling off and making a mess. This one is different. The spout stays on and in place and easy to pour from, to clean and it doesn't make a mess. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Vhonda

customer_reviews.title: refill problem
customer_reviews.text: When you refill you need 2 people, one to old the dispenser and the funnel, another person to pour the oil from the container. On top there is no indicator how much it's getting filled. I just spilled over lot of olive oil in the sink. If you are pouring with snail speed you may not spill but if you pour with Toyota Corolla speed not even ferrari, there is high chance you will waste some oil then go through the hassle of clearing with soap, the body of the dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: TZ Khan

customer_reviews.title: Leaks in 2 places!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been on the hunt for a really good olive oil dispenser that doesn't leak and after reading so many good reviews about Rachael Ray's EVOO dispenser, I finally cracked and made the purchase. BUT, I was extremely disappointed. It leaked not only at the spout (after pouring) but also at the lip of the bottle where the spout connects. Maybe Amazon sent me a "lemon" but at this point, I will be looking at other EVOO dispensers instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like this dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish and easy to fill and use, seems well made as it has fallen over once or twice onto the granite countertop and has not chipped or broken.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Gildein

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this thing. I saw some of the reviews disparaging these dispensers, but I don't know why. They look cool, the grip is ergonomic, and it does NOT leak. I use EVOO ALL the time, so this thing is always within arms reach. And even though you can't see into it, unless you're a complete moron or blazingly drunk at the time, you shouldn't have a problem filling it. Lets not nit pick here.
customer_reviews.author: Matt C.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and very functional
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold and poor oil when cooking. When not in use, it looks good! You have a choice of different colors to match your decor as well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A Neil

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional.
customer_reviews.text: The olive oil dispenser is attractive and works well. I keep it on my dining room table. I’m happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Oil &vinegar bottle
customer_reviews.text: There was a tiny dent in the metal part, but it works fine. I love the color and the way it looks. I t. Works like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Cam Sabato Vardeman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had these in the past, great quality and easy to use. Looks nice on a counter if you choose to display them.
customer_reviews.author: diane porter

customer_reviews.title: Not 10w-30!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, sturdy and thick. The bottle can take a bump here and there. It's stoneware so yes it can break if dropped or hit hard enough. Easy to fill. If u can't fill this bottle than maybe u shouldn't be cooking. Comes in many colors as well.
customer_reviews.author: SZEPNSHER

customer_reviews.title: Dripping...
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the fact that the oil drips after use. The bottle is always so greasy outside. Not worth the money at all.
customer_reviews.author: Preemie's parents

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I use 3 of these bottles in different colors for different types of oils that I use for cooking. They are very easy to use. But they look elegant sitting on my countertop and add a nice pop of color to my oil bar.
customer_reviews.author: Bijosh A Gopi

customer_reviews.title: Best Olive Oil Dispenser EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much, I bought one for my mother and one for my sister and they love it too! We each have a different color, (red, orange, and blue) and they're all beautiful. Absolutely does not drip!!! When you refill the bottle, use a funnel to make it easier. Easy to handle, great price, you'll wonder how you managed without it!
customer_reviews.author: Julie B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I have had one of these dispensers for olive oil and loved it so I bought another in another color for vegetable oil
customer_reviews.author: Bookchic

customer_reviews.title: Color not correct
customer_reviews.text: Love this beautiful. But I ordered blue and received a kind of teal color. But it does it's job. And I will live with the color
customer_reviews.author: madeline

customer_reviews.title: Great cooking oil bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is now a second oil bottle from Rachel ray that I purchased I have one with regular cooking oil and the other with olive oil. They are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Perreira

customer_reviews.title: Good looking evol
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and easy to use. Only complaint the small silver disc that is supposed to cover opening does not stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Schurman

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: I have these in orange but I changed my kitchen and colors as well. Great color, love this product!
customer_reviews.author: S. Dragon

customer_reviews.title: So elegant and handy
customer_reviews.text: The color is amazing. I wished they would have it in a smaller size thought. But overall is such a cutie in the kitchen. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but it leaks
customer_reviews.text: I love the look....and I hate that it leaks. We are probably going to have to get another one which sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Rinny Crocker

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I been looking for a cool olie oil dispenser and this one was perfect and cheaper that at Macys
customer_reviews.author: ana_nydia

customer_reviews.title: It’s a keeper
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don’t like is being unable to see where you are at when filling the bottle! Other than that I love the design. Easy pour easy handle color choices!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Practical and Decorative
customer_reviews.text: I needed an olive oil dispenser that was dorative enough to set on the counter and also had a covered spout. This one fit the bill. I was afraid it would be too large, but it isn't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it, looks great sitting out in the kitchen. You don't want to hide this in the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: itzKat

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: OMG; horrible design. You cannot see how much you are filling. Very slippery. Gorgeous color but stick with the clear upright decanter instead. Rachel, stick to cooking please!
customer_reviews.author: NC girl

product_meta.title: Rachael Ray Solid Glaze Ceramics EVOO Olive Oil Bottle Dispenser with Spout - 24 Ounce, Blue
product_meta.description: Color:BlueAccentuate freshly baked breads and garden vegetable platters with flavorful vinegars and oils using the Rachael Ray Cucina Ceramic EVOO Oil and Vinegar Dispensing Bottle. Crafted from sturdy ceramics and glazed with a warm, earthy color, this oil and vinegar bottle is ideal for adding extra virgin olive oil to warm bruschetta, savory pasta dishes and more. Merging everyday functionality with a touch of rustic, antiqued character, the ceramic dispensing bottle offers relaxed style in the kitchen and at the table. The EVOO bottle’s spout is proportioned to help provide perfect pouring control, and a clever freeform handle integrated into the curved bottle design provides ample handhold. Dishwasher safe for convenience, the eye-catching olive oil bottle complements stylish Cucina dinnerware with a pop of personality, and makes the perfect partner for ceramic dipping cups, ramekins, serving bowls, salad plates and serveware pieces in Rachael’s Cucina collections. Drizzle buttery olive oils on warm, crusty breads and other delicious foods using the fun and functional Rachael Ray Cucina EVOO Dispensing Bottle.
feature_bullets: This 24 oz. cruet is perfect for EVOO, extra virgin olive oil, or anything that you want to drizzle or pour.
The design is both contemporary and playful, lending itself to any type of home décor. From traditional to modern, this cruet adds function and style to your kitchen.
The opaque bottle and nonporous glazed interior keeps oil in the dark to avoid oxidation and preserve taste.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
